Producer: Bruna Papandrea, Steve Hutensky, Jodi Matterson, Robert Connolly, Eric Bana
Production Co: Pick Up Truck Pictures, Film Victoria, Made Up Stories, Cornerstone Pictures, Screen Australia, Arena Film, Media Super
Synopsis: Based on the global bestseller, a federal agent's homecoming leads to a deeply personal murder investigation that reopens old wounds and threatens to unravel the tight-knit small town.
Title: The Dry
